title: Birth: a film about feelings and experiences
creator_credit: Julian Aston, National Childbirth Trust and Julian Aston Productions
brief_description: A film in which women discuss their emotional response to childbirth as well as the physical experience. The importance of prenatal exercises is discussed and an actual birth is shown.
